code: import{AuthenticationHelper}from'../Helper/AuthenticationHelper';export function authHeader(){var credential=AuthenticationHelper.checkAuthentication();var token="";if(credential){token="Bearer "+credential.token;}var header={"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":token};return header;}export var HeaderHelper={getOptions:getOptions,postOptions:postOptions};export function getOptions(){return{method:'GET',headers:authHeader()};}export function postOptions(body){return{method:'POST',headers:authHeader(),body:body&&JSON.stringify(body)||null};}
